title: Shirin Neshat on Directing 'Looking for Oum Kulthum' and Making Art in Exile

sources.title: Shirin Neshat Looking for Oum Kulthum
sources.description: Synopsis Mitra, an ambitious artist around 40, a mother and a wife, embarks on her dream of making a film about her hero, the legendary female singer of the Arab world, Oum Kalthoum.

metadata.Plot: Artist and filmmaker Shirin Neshat discusses her work and feature film "Looking for Oum Kulthum," based on the life of the legendary Egyptian singer. Seeping in layers of introspection, ...
